card.name: Thought Courier
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Thran Golem
card.text: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

card.name: Threaten
card.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Thundermare
card.text: Haste When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

card.name: Tidal Kraken
card.text: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.

card.name: Tidings
card.text: Draw four cards.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Trade Routes
card.text: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand. {1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.

card.name: Traumatize
card.text: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Treasure Trove
card.text: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.

card.name: Treetop Bracers
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

card.name: Underground River
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Underworld Dreams
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.

card.name: Unholy Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

card.name: Ur-Golem's Eye
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Utopia Tree
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Verdant Force
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Verduran Enchantress
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Viashino Sandstalker
card.text: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand.

card.name: Viridian Shaman
card.text: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Vulshok Morningstar
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2}

card.name: Wanderguard Sentry
card.text: When Wanderguard Sentry enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Warrior's Honor
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Weathered Wayfarer
card.text: {W}, {T}: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls more lands than you.

card.name: Web
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach.

card.name: Weird Harvest
card.text: Each player may search his or her library for up to X creature cards, reveal those cards, and put them into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Whip Sergeant
card.text: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
card.text: Flying {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp.

card.name: Withering Gaze
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Worship
card.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Wurm's Tooth
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

card.name: Yawgmoth Demon
card.text: Flying First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you don't, tap Yawgmoth Demon and it deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Zealous Inquisitor
card.text: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

card.name: Zombify
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Zur's Weirding
card.text: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
